messages.title: Local People are Backing GEOFFREY COX
messages.content: Three Great Reasons to Vote for Geoffrey

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The Local Man with a Record of Local Action
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Since 2017, Geoffrey has helped over 3000 local people, held over 550 surgery appointments, secured millions for local communities, backed farm and small businesses, and fought for local interests like reopening Appledore Shipyard and keeping Dartmoor Prison.

Major investment in our rail, roads and broadband, hundreds more Devon police, the largest funding boost to our schools, 2 new local hospitals and state-of-the-art cancer screening to serve our communities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Keeping Our Economy Strong and Getting Brexit Done
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A sound economic plan. Record jobs, low inflation, rising wages, tax cut for low and middle earners, the deficit beaten and continuing growth. Your hard work. Don't let Corbyn wreck it.

issues.economy: Record jobs, low inflation, rising wages, tax cut for low and middle earners, the deficit beaten and continuing growth.
issues.education: The largest funding boost to our schools
issues.health: 2 new local hospitals and state-of-the-art cancer screening to serve our communities.

images.caption: Geoffrey Cox with a group of people and with an individual, suggesting local engagement and support.
